name: fEarth.128: An Unexpected Walk
description:
During your walk on the planet fEarth.128 you'll come across:

- Puzzles
- Challenging gameplay
- An abundance of different enemy types
- Six biomes, each of which contains three different levels
- Bosses with unique mechanics, awaiting you at the end of each biome
- Original soundtrack
- Deep story
- Atmospheric world
- Secrets and Easter eggs

It is up to you to lead Copper Spider through all the obstacles and puzzles he'll encounter on his way so that he could finally meet with his friends
